message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $14,000. I think it will be very valuable to you, and this is a fair price.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm interested in the product, but I can't go higher than $12,000 at this time.  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $12,000 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
